channel.title: Please Help! With my Members Code!

item.title: Please Help! With my Members Code!
item.dc:creator: @HHC HHC
item.description:
@HHC wrote:

Its not kicking and writing the persons name into the members.txt
Im using Project Czar and i dont know why its not working

if (command.startsWith("members") && playerHasItemAmount(995, 1000000)) { if(playerIsMember == 1) {sendMessage("You already are a member!"); } else { playerIsMember = 0; deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10000000); try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5); sendMessage("You kicked "+command.substring(5)); System.out.println("Member Code is Now is now kicking "+playerName+" for members "+command.substring(5));; } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help! With my Members Code!
